name: Maliban Chocolate Puff
description: Chocoholics and non-Chocoholics alike savour the sensational choco-richness of the Maliban chocolate Puff. A soft biscuit with a firm crunch and wholesome Chocolate filling, Sri Lankans the world-over still look to their trusted Maliban Chocolate Puff as the ideal tea time accompaniment. *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
